channel.title: Aryan Problem
channel.description:
Well, I used to be an Aryan user until Regex BSed us all etc. So now I come back. I removed Tortise SVN off my computer and forgot what to do with that whole thing. I looked at the Ultimate Aryan guide, and that didn't help at all really.
So, do I still Tortise SVN to use Aryan? does anyone have a link to 366? (and I don't want it from some person who has 2 posts)
Thanks, I_Drew_I

item.title: Aryan Problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Drew_I I_Drew_I
item.description:
@I_Drew_I wrote:

Okay, thanks notsaslipen.
So now we are just waiting on a 367 I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan Problem
item.dc:creator: @notsaslipen notsaslipen
item.description:
@notsaslipen wrote:

you no longer use SVN to update now all you do is download it streight from these forums. find trusted people that update aryan and use their version. i mostly use Neirce or Masty i heard Tieos or somthing like that is a trusted person also. make sure you read what other people have said about the updater before you download their version so u don’t end up with stolen accounts. aslo now that SVN is no longer in use it makes it harder for people to get quick updates so you have to pay attention to the forums in order to get a copy of an updated version most of the time they will update 1-2 days after aryan updates but be carful from who u get the update from!

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan Problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Drew_I I_Drew_I
item.description:
@I_Drew_I wrote:

They took out off Sythe because it “died”, then someone said “No, it’s not dead.” and that’s the last I heard about it …

So Sythe.org isn’t really helpful.

If anyone has the guide that was on Kaitnieks … that’d be pretty 1337.

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan Problem
item.dc:creator: @cmatuch cmatuch
item.description:

[quote=“I_Drew_I, post:1, topic:717”]Well, I used to be an Aryan user until Regex BSed us all etc.
So now I come back.
I removed Tortise SVN off my computer and forgot what to do with that whole thing.
I looked at the Ultimate Aryan guide, and that didn’t help at all really.

So,
do I still Tortise SVN to use Aryan?
does anyone have a link to 366?
(and I don’t want it from some person who has 2 posts)

Thanks,
I_Drew_I[/quote]

I forgot how to do that too, i had downloaded SVN yesterday, and iwas looking at the tut, it said to search sythe, but sythe dont have a tutorial… what are we supposed to do?

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan Problem
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“I_Drew_I, post:4, topic:717”]Wasn’t that all over Kaitnieks forums …
That he told Jagex how to detect it.
So when you logged on it immediately said “You have been flagged”.[/quote]

lol, jagex automatically flagged EVERYONE for a full week before the mass ban, it wasnt just aryan, and jagex definatly would not listen to RegeX about anything :rolleyes:

and unnamed, regex didnt backstab anyone, aryan forces some actions, and when jagex flagged everyone it was obvious who was forcing actions and who wasnt, simple as that

Read full topic
